title: Coronavirus threatening expat exodus from the UAE
description: The foreign workforce is paying the price as the economy is squeezed by the virus.

title: Phone bill charges of £1,200 added 'without permission'
description: Sally Giles says a subscription service charged her £4.50 each week for more than five years without her consent.

title: Victory in battle against 'thuggish' debt letters
description: Letters using block capitals and sent to those falling seriously behind on debts will be "less threatening".

title: CEO Secrets: The graduates launching start-ups in lockdown
description: Meet the graduates who have started businesses in lockdown.

title: Parents record song 'to change perceptions of Down's syndrome'
description: Neive's parents produce a music video to change perceptions about people with Down's syndrome.

title: Fighting Covid-19 in Afghanistan over the phone
description: The charity Teleheal helps fight coronavirus in Afghanistan by providing critical medical advice over the phone.

title: Covid and Trump: The president's healthcare v the average American's
description: Luxury suites, experimental drugs and how the president's VIP Covid treatment differs from the norm.

title: Four Covid rules broken by Trump and the White House
description: How did so many of President Trump's top team become infected with coronavirus?

title: Hundreds of musicians protest outside Parliament
description: A 400-strong ensemble play together to highlight the plight of the music industry.

title: Being black at Cambridge University
description: The BBC has followed three black students during their first year at the UK’s University of Cambridge.

title: Gunnersaurus: Mesut Ozil offers to pay wage of Arsenal mascot
description: Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil offers to pay the salary of Jerry Quy, the man who plays the role of club mascot Gunnersaurus.

title: HMS Queen Elizabeth: Images win Royal Navy photographic award
description: Winning images capture the lives of Royal Navy sailors and Royal Marines around the globe.

title: Sali Hughes: I met the woman who trolled me online
description: A journalist and broadcaster describes her experience of being targeted on a "trashing" site.
